review.title: “Great company”
review.pros: Pros – Owners willing to listen to employees for suggestions and ideas. Good pay scale
review.cons: Cons – Dependent on government work for domestic business
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get more training for sales staff

review.title: “Good company”
review.pros: Pros – I disagree with the person above. I don't know what department they worked in but I don't feel unappreciated or not trusted nor do I know of anyone who feels that way. I think it's a good place to work and everyone seems happy there, and that is a nice environment to be in.
review.cons: Cons – None. I think a poor attitude will get you poor results.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Like being on a hamster wheel, always on edge and never felt appreciated.”
review.pros: Pros – Benefits and able to leave the job at work
review.cons: Cons – Micro managed too much, small company family ran, management won't delegate. Mistrust in the employees. Lack of brand name; has a tough time competing against the more well-known brands. Success in firm entirely dependent on who you know and how long you been there.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Recommendation is to stop selling your souls
